# Radio

> **来源**: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/radio
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-27T00:25:15.644931

---

A device you can use to play your favorite Fortnite music. Compare to [Speaker](https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite-creative/fortnite-creative-glossary#speaker).
